name: austax
description: Simplistic command line tool to calculate gross income and net income given an annual salary (for Australians only! :))

scripts.coverage: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/unit/domain/*.test.js --recursive -- -u exports -R spec && open coverage/lcov-report/index.html

author: Juan Carlos Cancela <cancela.juancarlos@gmail.com>
